text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Red Sea Governorate | settlement_type = Governorate | image_flag = Governadorat de la mar Roja.png | flag_size = 120px | image_blank_emblem = Coat of arms of Red Sea Governorate.JPG | blank_emblem_size = 75px | image_map = Red Sea in Egypt (de-facto only hatched).svg | map_caption = Red Sea Governorate on the map of Egypt | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Hurghada (capital) | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | government_footnotes = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 203,685 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 366000 | population_as_of = January 2018 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | website = | iso_code = | calling_code = | footnotes = }} Red Sea Governorate is a governorate in Egypt. The capital and largest city is Hurghada. It is between the Nile and the Red Sea in the southeast of the country. ==References== Category:Governorates of Egypt
title: Red Sea Governorate
